summary: A young Asian girl applies for a job at a massage parlor and is dragged into the seedy world of Hollywood's red light district, where she falls in love with a virgin poet.
cast: Luciano Saber|Kaycee|Tomiko Lee|Gina Hiraizumi|Kate Holliday|Hiromi Nishiyama|Mari Tanaka|Dennis James Lee|Ginni Ramos|Tim Colceri|David Mersault|Edwin A. Santos|Rosco Karzas|Jesse Pate|Lea Downey|Justin Born|Tommy Le|Erin Marie Moore|Julie DellaRipa|Jasmine Jong Ok Kang|Kazumi Aihara|Tony T.L. Young|Johnny Kim|Mason Rhee
title: Soap Girl
